t: Isaac Mizrahi - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - Isaac Mizrahi (born October 14, 1961) is an American fashion designer, actor, singer, television presenter and chief designer of the Isaac Mizrahi brand for Xcel Brands. Based in New York City, he is best known for his eponymous fashion lines. Mizrahi was previously a judge on Project Runway ...

t: Clothing - Isaac Mizrahi
